section.section: Within 72 hours after a person takes custody of a child of unknown parentage, the person shall prepare and file a report, on the form that the Secretary provides.

text.section: The person shall enter the place where the child was found as the place of birth.
A report under this section is the certificate of birth for the child.

If the child is identified and a certificate of birth is found or obtained, the report under this section:
Shall be sealed; and
May be reopened only:
On order of a court of competent jurisdiction;
On written order of a designee of the Secretary; or
As the rules and regulations of the Secretary provide.
